primary_findings: Visual-Text Consistency: Strong match between images and description

Review Authenticity: Potential review manipulation detected. The most negative impact came from review 3 (classified as 'bot-like' with strong confidence): "The material is very very thin and fabric doesn't feel like cotton. It's no way close to other brand...". Full analysis: Review 1: Classified as 'genuine' (confidence: 0.56) - Authentic customer review with specific details; Review 2: Classified as 'genuine' (confidence: 0.49) - Authentic customer review with specific details; Review 3: Classified as 'bot-like' (confidence: 0.79) - Patterns consistent with automated generation; Review 4: Classified as 'bot-like' (confidence: 0.55) - Patterns consistent with automated generation; Review 5: Classified as 'bot-like' (confidence: 0.77) - Patterns consistent with automated generation
No clear brand identified in product title

Return Feedback Analysis: Frequent return issues reported. The most negative impact came from feedback 1: 'Item not as described' (this was a strongly negative factor). Full analysis: Feedback 1: Contains negative trigger words; Feedback 2: Classified as NEGATIVE (confidence: 1.00); Feedback 3: Contains negative trigger words
